document.full_text: yemen's government and armed tribesmen demanding president ali abdullah saleh leave power agreed on saturday to end their confrontation which had brought the poor arabian peninsula country to the brink of civil war.
document.title: yemeni government and tribesmen agree truce
lines_and_colors: yemen's government and armed tribesmen demanding president ali abdullah saleh leave power agreed on saturday to end their confrontation which had brought the poor arabian peninsula country to the brink of civil war.
